news.title: Biden Takes Lead In Pennsylvania
news.description:
Democrat, Joe Biden, took the lead in key battleground state of.Pennsylvania on Friday, where a victory for the former Vice President would push him past the threshold of electoral votes needed to win the White House, official data showed.
According to AFP, more ballots are yet to be counted, but shortly before 1400 GMT, Biden had moved ahead of incumbent President, Donald Trump, by more than 5,500 votes, according to official provisional results from the state government.

Onifade, a 200-level student of the Department of History at Tai Solarin University of Education, Ijagun, Ogun State, was on October 24 reporting the crisis between the police and some thugs as an intern with Gboah TV when he was arrested by the task force team in Oko-Oba, Agege,

news.title: Court Rules In Favour Of Ahmad Nuhu Bamalli In Zazzau Emir Tussle
news.description:
Ahmad Nuhu Bamalli


A Kaduna State High Court sitting in Dogarawa, Sabon Gari, Zaria, Kaduna State, has ruled that Alhaji Ahmad Nuhu Bamalli is the 19th Emir of Zazzau.
Presiding judge, Justice Kabir Dabo, also ruled that the emir should be inaugurated on Monday, November 9, by the state governor, Mallam Nasir el-Rufai.


Ahmad Nuhu Bamalli





The ruling followed a suit by Iyan Zazzau, Bashar Aminu, challenging the appointment of the new emir.
